sentences.en: ...a crown of flowers.
sentences.cn: …一个花冠。

sentences.en: a crown encrusted with diamonds
sentences.cn: 镶满钻石的王冠

sentences.en: a crown of flowers
sentences.cn: 花冠

sentences.en: a crown studded with gems
sentences.cn: 镶有宝石的皇冠

sentences.en: a hat with a high crown
sentences.cn: 高顶帽

sentences.en: At the coronation, the archbishop put a crown on the Queen's head.
sentences.cn: 在加冕典礼上, 大主教把王冠戴在女王头上.

sentences.en: Barnstaple crown court was told he caused an affray at a pub in Braunton, Devon.
sentences.cn: 有人向巴恩斯特珀尔刑事法院告发他在德文郡布朗顿的一家酒馆打架滋事。

sentences.en: Bristol Crown Court granted conditional bail with a surety of £2,500.
sentences.cn: 英国布里斯托尔刑事法庭准予有条件保释，保证金为2,500英镑。

sentences.en: Can she retain her Wimbledon crown?
sentences.cn: 她能保住温布尔登的冠军宝座吗？

sentences.en: He appeared at Manchester Crown Court on Thursday on a drink-driving charge.
sentences.cn: 他因被控醉酒驾车而于周四在曼彻斯特的刑事法庭受审。

sentences.en: He is expected to be committed for trial at Liverpool Crown Court.
sentences.cn: 预计他会被移交利物浦高等刑事法庭。

sentences.en: He laid his hand gently on the crown of her head.
sentences.cn: 他把手轻轻放在她的头顶上。

sentences.en: He went on to win the world crown in 2001.
sentences.cn: 他接着在2001年又赢得了世界冠军称号。

sentences.en: He won the crown in 1973.
sentences.cn: 他荣获1973年冠军称号.

sentences.en: His achievement is astonishing and this book is the jewel in his crown.
sentences.cn: 他的成就令人震惊，而这部书则是他的杰作。

sentences.en: How long does it take to have crowns fitted?
sentences.cn: 镶齿冠需要多长时间？

sentences.en: it was cold and raining, and, to crown it all, we had to walk home.
sentences.cn: 天很冷，又在下着雨，更糟糕的是，我们得步行回家。

sentences.en: land owned by the Crown
sentences.cn: 王国的土地

sentences.en: Louis was crowned at Reims in 814.
sentences.cn: 路易于814年在兰斯加冕。

sentences.en: The crown and the scepter are the insigne of kings.
sentences.cn: 王冠与权杖是国王的标志.

sentences.en: The crown court, however, upheld the magistrate's decision.
sentences.cn: 然而，最高法院维持了地方法院的判决。

sentences.en: The crown is an attribute of kingship.
sentences.cn: 皇冠是王位的象征

sentences.en: The crown was set with precious jewels—diamonds, rubies and emeralds.
sentences.cn: 王冠上镶嵌着稀世珍宝—有钻石、红宝石、绿宝石。

sentences.en: the scene is the crowning glory of this marvellously entertaining show.
sentences.cn: 该场面是这部精彩娱乐片的精华。

words.tran_cn: 加冕，使成王（crown的过去式和过去分词形式）
加冕；居…之顶；表彰；使圆满完成

phrases.tran_cn: n. 英国刑事法庭；（英国）巡回刑事法庭
冠状齿轮；差动器侧面伞齿轮
皇冠上的宝石；（镶在王冠、权杖等上面以显示王权的）御宝
麒麟花；荆棘王冠；棘冠星鱼
n. 将继承王位的公主；女王储
（事物的）最好方面；最显著方面
（作为一系列极其幸运或不幸的事件的结尾）更让人高兴的是；更糟糕的是

trans.tran_cn: 王冠，桂冠，王国（政府），王位，顶部
trans.tran_en: the position you have if you have won an important sports competition

trans.tran_cn: 为…加冕，形成…的顶部，使圆满
trans.tran_en: to place a crown on the head of a new king or queen as part of an official ceremony in which they become king or queen
to place a crown on the head of a new king or queen as part of an official ceremony in which they become king or queen
